DiS and Vigil are two friends who act on their plan to visit the (supposedly) haunted residence the newspapers have been covering recently. Unbeknownst to them, however, the place is not as abandoned as the press makes out...
Once DiS discovers that Vigil, who arrived at the scene earlier, is nowhere around, he is drawn into exploring the mysterious past of the psychotic murderer who once called the place home, to ultimately discover the fate of his friend.
